mapper.select: SELECT buytd.id,buy.buyerName,buyt.mytaskNo,buytd.jdorderno,buytd.taskstate FROM t_my_task_detail buytd inner join t_my_task buyt on buytd.mytaskid=buyt.id and buyt.del_flag=0 inner join t_task_base sttb on sttb.id=buytd.taskid and sttb.del_flag=0 inner join t_buyer_info buy on buy.userid=buytd.buyerid and buy.del_flag=0 where buytd.del_flag=0
